law.catch_line: Notification of cabinet in actions seeking recovery for recipient.
law.text: In any action seeking to recover damages on behalf of a recipient, the cabinet shall receive notice from the recipient's attorney in the same manner as provided in KRS 411.188 (2) for notifying parties with subrogation rights.
law.history: Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 506, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1994.
